uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.manage

Class IDiskStoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.manage.IDiskStoreManager

  • public class IDiskStoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for disk-based instance-stores associated with Frames Models (FM). Each such instance-store is represented by a suitable implementation of IStore, which is registered by, and can be retrieved via, the relevant CModel object.
